verses.verse: And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may hold a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I should <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H853>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> will I <S%H853>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7122>met<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> us: let us <S%H1980>go,<s%> we pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he fall <S%H6293>upon<s%> us with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> do ye, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H6544>let<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H4480>works?<s%> <S%H4639><s%> <S%H1980>get<s%> you unto your <S%H5450>burdens.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and ye make them <S%H7673>rest<s%> <S%H853><s%> from their <S%H4480>burdens.<s%> <S%H5450><s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick,<s%> as <S%H8543>heretofore:<s%> <S%H8032><s%> let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> for themselves.

And the <S%H4971>tale<s%> of the <S%H3843>bricks,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> did <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8543>heretofore,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> ye shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1639>diminish<s%> aught <S%H4480>thereof:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> be <S%H7503>idle;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6817>cry,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Let there more work be <S%H3513>laid<s%> <S%H5656><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>labor<s%> therein; and let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H8159>regard<s%> <S%H8267>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> I will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H859>ye,<s%> <S%H3947>get<s%> you <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H4480>where<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye can <S%H4672>find<s%> it: <S%H3588>yet<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H1697>aught<s%> of your <S%H4480>work<s%> <S%H5656><s%> shall be <S%H1639>diminished.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> instead of <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> <S%H213>hasted<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3615>Fulfill<s%> your <S%H4639>works,<s%> your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H1697>tasks,<s%> as <S%H834>when<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, were <S%H5221>beaten,<s%> and <S%H559>demanded,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> have ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3615>fulfilled<s%> your <S%H2706>task<s%> in making <S%H3835>brick<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> as <S%H8543>heretofore?<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H6213>dealest<s%> thou <S%H3541>thus<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants?<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and they <S%H559>say<s%> to us, <S%H6213>Make<s%> <S%H3843>brick:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H5221>beaten;<s%> but the <S%H2398>fault<s%> is in thine own <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> are <S%H7503>idle,<s%> ye are <S%H7503>idle:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> and <S%H5647>work;<s%> for there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> you, yet shall ye <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H8506>tale<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks.<s%>

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> that they were in <S%H7451>evil<s%> case, after it was <S%H559>said,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1639>minish<s%> aught from your <S%H4480>bricks<s%> <S%H3843><s%> of your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H1697>task.<s%>

And they <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H7125>way,<s%> as they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and <S%H8199>judge;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> ye have <S%H853>made<s%> our <S%H7381>savor<s%> to be <S%H887>abhorred<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> us.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> hast thou so evil <S%H7489>entreated<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> is <S%H2088>it<s%> that thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> me?

For <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H227><s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> he hath done <S%H7489>evil<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hast thou <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5337>all.<s%>
